name: Similar Web
description: This API helps you to query website traffic and key metrics for any website, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source... to create a plugin like similarweb.com

utterances.utterance: Can you show me a list of countries with their metadata?
What countries are available in the database along with their details?
Provide me with a list of all countries and their associated metadata.
I need to see the metadata for all countries in the system.
Could you list all the countries along with their metadata?
Show me the countries and their corresponding metadata.
What are the countries included in the dataset with their metadata?
Can you give me a list of countries and their metadata information?
I’d like to see the metadata for each country available.
List all the countries and their metadata details for me.

api_methods.name: get-analysis
api_methods.description: Get website traffic, key metrics, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Any site or domain that you are familiar with. Ex : amazon.com

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the traffic metrics for google.com?
What’s the engagement rate for bbc.co.uk?
Could you provide the traffic ranking for nytimes.com?
I’d like to see the keyword ranking for ebay.com.
Can you analyze the traffic sources for cnn.com?
What are the key metrics for wikipedia.org?
Show me the traffic analysis for reddit.com.

What’s the traffic ranking for amazon.com?
Can you provide the keyword ranking for youtube.com?
